DOC.brief_summary: A study to research whether subconjunctival bevacizumab injection may potentially suppress neovascularization in pterygium, retarding and decreasing the size of recurrent pterygium.
DOC.detailed_description: 1. Pacients with recurrent pterygium 2. Anti-VEGF therapy -Bevacizumab
DOC.criteria: Recurrent pterygium Pregnant or lactating women History of myocardial infarction History of stroke
